text:
JK Rowling's Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald released over the weekend, but apparently, she has failed to impress our Bollywood actress Juhi Chawla.
BCCL
Juhi Chawla is apparently in London where she watched Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald. Looks like she didn’t quite like the movie. Taking it to Twitter, the actress called the movie a terrible film.
What’s more? It is after watching the movie that she realised that Aamir Khan looks like Jude Law. Yes, that’s what she wrote in the tweet.
Just watched a terrible movie, Fantastic Beasts .. Jude Law was so nice .. and something about his features ... so like Aamir Khan 🧐🧐...😀😀 @aamir_khan pic.twitter.com/8evNZKc4Ql — Juhi Chawla (@iam_juhi) November 17, 2018
And here’s how fans reacted to this.
U said terrible movie.... U mean u like the movie or didn't understand it or what exactly u want to express... — Vibha Rajni Maniyar (@VibhaM05) November 17, 2018
Don't Miss 862 SHARES 346 SHARES 183 SHARES 151 SHARES 185 SHARES
yes aamir's face resembles a lot with jude law and tom hanks pic.twitter.com/EkytH6ypfg — Manish (@manish_mnsh1) November 17, 2018
Fantastic Beasts terrible 🤔
I would highly recommend you don't watch #ThugsOfHindostan then
It has the makings for induced coma 🙈 — pöpëyë (@da_sailor_man) November 17, 2018
Terrible??? — Abhina Pradeep (@abhi197) November 17, 2018
Very disappointing movie — Dr Rashid Niaz (@rashidniaz189) November 18, 2018
Have you watched Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald? Tell us if you liked it in the comments section below.
title: Juhi Chawla Calls Fantastic Beasts 2 A ‘Terrible Movie’, Thinks Jude Law Looks Like Aamir Khan
description: Juhi Chawla is apparently in London where she watched Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald. Looks like she didn’t quite like the movie. Taking it to Twitter, the actress called the movie a terrible film. What’s more? It is after watching the movie that she realised that Aamir Khan looks like Jude Law. Yes, that’s what she wrote in the tweet.
